songs.title: Forgotten Past
songs.lyrics:
[Letra y musica: Death]

Deep in your mind
There is another side
A morbid truth
When i can not hide
Unimaginable gore
Was your past time high
To hear people scream
To watch them die

Return back to the burial site
Face your dreams upon this night
Severed limbs not far away
Spirit past you now obey

Images of the forgotten past
Ypur first life revealed at last
Now you' ll find to your surprise
All the corpses you left dehind

A place you feel
You' ve been to before
Where life would turn
Rigth into gore
You dig deep down
Through the years of decay
The truth is revealed
You found your way
